the simplicity of this film is attractive straightforward characters motivations and storytelling it doesnt get hung up on unnecessary backstory or fleshing out characters beyond what they need to be for an allout action film this is a good and refreshingly honest choice  it maintains the pace makes the transitions through the story slick and allows you to sit back and enjoy it it is also a risky tactic because the lack of depth demands that every element of the film be tight and foolproof it nearly pulls it off  the performances which have to drive the narrative and create the energy in the absence of detail  are all excellent and the leads very well cast unfortunately the film seems to chicken out at certain crucial moments falling back on tired tropes to manufacture tension makes one or two decisions which do not fit in with the limited picture we have of him and therefore feel incongruous theres a clumsy kill everyone except the woman and then regret it later clich most disappointing is the ageold antagonist walks away leaving henchmen to kill hero trope which feels utterly stupid and out of place in a world constructed as deliberately ruthless viggo is supposed to understand the situation and the man he is up against he knows his ability to escape impossible situations and he knows how many times his own men have failed he has no affection for john and he wants him dead but he leaves his armed henchmen alone in the room to suffocate him with a plastic bag this ruins the whole atmosphere and aesthetic of the filmdespite these disappointing moments this has enough to it to make it a worthwhile watch an honest action flick is one to be praised

this film is nothing more than a reimagining of those old movies from the 70s where some evil people kill a guys wifefamilydogwhatever and he goes on a bloody vendetta the outlaw josey wales comes to mind or basically any charles bronson film with a touch of taken and the usual suspects thrown in there is no time to get to know any of the characters they have zero depth which is fitting since keanu reeves lacks the ability to portray threedimensional characters as the body count piles up willem dafoes character drifts in here and there but he isnt given much to do except look pensive and drift away again this is the perfect film to watch if you just want to zone out and not think very much there are no challenging ideas for you to struggle with just lots and lots of stabbings shootings and headbashings it must have been incredibly easy to write the script for this film

for the people rating this film low quite frankly i find your lack of taste and intelligence disturbing as your narcissistic view of other people like me who adore this silly yet badass film about vengeance nevertheless there is little i have to complain about this filmnow spoilers ahead i think it simply a near perfect film about how a oddly relatable super assassin who is just grieving the loss of his wife and just wants to be left alone and have some semblance of peace in his life but some punks who think they are just the coolest guys ever come in and break into his home kill his and foolishly because they are typical foolish thugs leave the man alive from the beginning of the film up to that point you are 120 on john side as he effortlessly just dispatches men like they are ants with the mob boss running scared doing everything he can think of to keep the legendary baba yaga from slaughtering him and his entire family and his entire syndicate even attempting to hire a man that could have possibly picked off but ultimately betrays his own mob boss client in favor of john at the cost of his life i really dont have much bad to say about this film other than it is admittingly silly and over the top but that is also what makes it so charming and fantastic and the film even is aware that it is silly but yet its entertaining from beginning to the very end it gets a very rare 1010 from me

on paper this film looks like a typical action film however the things that set this film apart is the stylishness of the film and the incredible world it createsfirst of all keanu reeves shows he still has what it takes to be a successful actor he gives a multi layered performance as mr and makes you fear this fictional character and after watching the film i am thankful one thing that adds to the film is that reeves did that majority of his own stunts this makes the action feel more fluid and the man even more badass after seeing reeves in this film i could imagine no one else in the role the films strongest trait is the fight sequences once the action starts it never seems to stop the fights are brilliantly choreographed and they seem realistic and brutal the mixture of martial arts the character uses shows real skill and adds to the realistic feel of the film and world created proves himself capable of killing with both hands and firearm if youre a fan of brilliant action sequences then this is the film for youthe only criticism of the film is the plot although the story brilliantly creates a world of assassins the plot itself is nothing new and has been seen before however despite this i was left satisfied that i had not seen an action film like itoverall left me wanting more and is a real treat for action fans and keanu fans bring on chapter 2

i think im a little late to the party on this one and i guess it must have cost me im an actionmovie fan i grew up in the arniesly era of the eighties and i have plenty of mindless action flicks in my dvd collection  everything from commando to the mode recent shoot em up pleases me to a degree and keanu reeves pops up a fair times in my watchlist however somehow his film where he plays the titular slipped past me ive only just seen it after its sequel was released and during that time ive seen many a positive review saying how great it was therefore by the time i got round to watching it my hopes were highi guess what happened is the reverse of when i watched sex tape and the big screen adaptation of the dukes of hazzard both had been absolutely slated by the critics so my expectations were suitably lowered by the time i saw them and weirdly enough i actually took some small amount of entertainment in both im not saying either were particularly good but enjoyable enough if you were in the right mood this time my hopes were so high i found that what i got didnt really live up to what i was expecting i was waiting for something truly revolutionary and different from anything id seen before what i got felt like just another action moviedont get me wrong  its not bad it was enjoyable enough but it wasnt anything i hadnt seen before is a retired hitman whos forced out of retirement when a baddie played by game of thrones alfie allen kills his yes thats basically the catalyst and motivation for the entire film what follows is your average and i deliberately use the word average rollercoaster of violence and revenge everything youd expect is there gunfights are plentiful theres at least one car chase a betrayal and eventually comes face to face with the evil head honcho so its all there and its well done the violence and there is violence  no pg13 here is believable and gritty and keanu reeves is always fun to watch even when hes trying to be moody and miserable hes still that longhaired bogus surferdude we all fell in love with back in the early nineties so i can see how theres much going for it i was just expecting more and thats a shame really because my hopes were so high that even though everything i like was  technically  there i still came away with the feeling like it wasnt that much of a big deal but like i said earlier a sequel has been made and i will definitely watch that tooat the end of the day this film may not have entirely clicked with me but im glad that keanu reeves is back in a decent franchise and it puts him back in the spotlight  maybe can team up with liam neeson in a taken crossover o

keanu reeves is an immense performer as he is an elite hit man on a revenge mission his name is enough for his enemies to question their decisions its foreshadowed in the whole movieit is an awesome action movie a deep story and a strong character arch and produced with the slick action techniques of today which you will see in very few films unlike most action movies of this era this film does not rely on quick and nauseating camera movement to show off its cool action moves instead it uses steady and uncut scenes for you to appreciate how much of a bad ass keanu reeves isit one of those hidden gems that are between these piles of garbage if you hit it you are rich it one of those which deserve popularity but is dragged down by the lack of promotion i am so glad i watched this looking forward to chapter 2
this is an extraordinary movie even if its only about shootings and fights it is still amazing and very entertaining to watch and serious

its the story of theon greyjoy who kills the puppy of a professional assassinirony this assassin has no purpose in life other than to shoot other assassins they all hang out in the same club and buildings which is very practical in this kind of situation of course as the french would say not bad for an action flick but im definitely over gun fights and gun choreography in movies so i didnt enjoy this one as much as some people theres really not much in terms of story arc and character development

another awesome performance from keanu reeves i really like the plot all the action are very nice executed if some real fighting moves from martial arts i like the shooting scenes and for these one keanu received some special training the soundtrack is another interesting thing from the movie it fit well i am looking forward to see the second movie of that one released earlier this year 2017 for action movies fans keanu reeves fans this is another movie to be seen

is an amazing action movie it is everything that i love about action revenge type of movies and i think this one nailed it out of the park keanu reeves performance as the title character was awesome he didnt need to say a word for you to feel what he felt and that is awesome you can get behind his character 100 and root for him if you like action and revenge movies i highly suggest this movie

just wondering where the sudden rain and lightning came from when viggo pushes johns car off the ledge on the docks side question 0 of all millionaires go all the way across the city to a helicopter at the docks love the movie just confused if john is after me i would go somewhere other than my house to sit and wait

the bloody action movie added a new style to action and reignited the long career of keanu reeves as an action star reeves0 is a retired assassin who has moved on to a simple life with his wife when she dies of cancer overcome with grief is only able to have a semblance of hope from the gift his wife left him a small puppy encounters russian gangster iosef tarasov alfie allen and seemingly insults him by not selling awesome car iosef retaliates by coming to house beating him up and killing his this action sparks a series of bloody gun battles as pursues iosef through gangsters on a violent path for revenge iosefs father viggo michael nyqvist is the head of the russian mob and seeks to protect his son from the boogeyman that is he hires a former colleague of marcus willem dafoe to take him out path leads him to an exclusive assassin hotel where there are rules to not do business inside the walls and hints at a greater world of assassins check out more of this review and others at swillikycom

i seriously can not wait to watch the sequel for this there are so many things i love about this film i dont know where to start i love how this movie came out of nowhere and just kicked everyone in the backside reeves is intense and you can just tell he is loving every minute of it the world building is an extra bonus the only thing i didnt like about the film is the final fight scene other then that hats off and great times for all the film is about the son of a mega boss killing the of keanu reeves and reeves taking vengeance this movie has the action moves along great the dialogue is the magic behind it all keanu reeves is such an underrated actor because he does action flicks people love to watch im just happy to see him owning his craft

imagine that your entire family was wiped out killed one by one and all that is left in your life is a puppy and someone kills the puppy well that is the story of our friend john here he will stop at nothing to figure out who killed his best friend the this movie is a lot of fun to the core action and suspense packed with thrills i highly recommend seeing the movie if you have a strong appitite for a action packed fun thrill ride kinda movie or if you are looking for a good time i suggest that you watch it yes the violence in the movie is strong and brutal at times but it is still a winner watch it you will not be disappointed that you did

i wanted to give you a quick review of this film and i do recommend it if you like hitman movies this movie is about a hitman who has gone into a peaceful lifestyle and stopped his work as retired until he is forced back into work after becoming involved with the russian mafia it is a great spin of a story taking place in new york city and has fantasy aspects that you may enjoy if you are a fan of for example hitman agent 47 movie  video gamei watched this with low expectancy having keanu reeves as my 2nd to most favorite actor of 2017 i decided i wanted to see this after new years check out this movie 2 coming out in feburary 2017 i will too

for years decades hollywood tried to shove stupid action movies down our throatsevery bullet misses punches arent heavy at all and the hero aaaaalways has to say somethingfeaturing the fantastic amazing wonderful keanu reeves is showing hollywood how its supposed to be done in a 100 minutes long movie which is actually rather short for todays trends the movie makes us feel like john feels hate like john hates and cheer as john kills its one of the few nonsuperhero action movies that wives and husbands can watch together and completely enjoy itwhile respecting the the heroes story timeline mixes it up and shows us all that all it takes to create a badass action hero and a great action movie franchiseshoot kill repeat no senseless talking explaining dramatizing does exactly what every single one of us watchers would want to do in his situationgreat movie great fun awesome keanuthe only thing that could improve the movie would be brendan fraser

i missed the very beginning but soon caught up when dad asks son you stole john car and killed his the game of thrones actor clearly never learned his lesson back in the day and should have just presented his nut sack on a plate to and said sorry as it was he didnt take his error of judgement seriously and we get to enjoy a retired hit man regain his touch a lot of dead bodies usually clinical believable action if you believe in trained man against oafish clumsy boys few facial expressions little humour it works cause who really cracks jokes when fighting for your life or dusting yourself down after being given a good beating which receives quite a lot actually more grown up than die hard not as dark as the mel gibson i just want my 70000 dollars movie great cameos in there too during a good action shoot em up hour and a half

i have ambivalent feelings after watching this movie this is a stylish action film where the actions are so cool and believable and sometimes even too realistic however the acting of the supporting roles actors is simplistic we have seen thousands of such acting instances in average hollywood movies the story is bad i understand the the movie is meant to be an action movie for having fun time but sometimes the story is so bad that i felt uncomfortable on my coachone interesting fact there seems to be a cinematographic novelty in this film with regard to fights the full scale mixture of martial arts and gun fight this was what i was long waiting for because in reality this is what will happen if we have a welltrained hit man good job

i was concerned this will be another dull same old same old moviebut it wasntthis is a great action movie that creates a new superhero assassin it pulls you in emotionally and then kicks the holly out of the baddies i love it there is very few words spoken in the movie but it achieves something incredibly entertaining the magic of the continental and the sophistication of the secret world combines with the hardcore grip of a pure action adventurethe director and writers should be commended for creating a masterpiece that other recent superhero movies can just aspire to

i like action movies although fight scenes usually bore me a little most scenes in this movie however are very smooth the men in suits make things look more sophisticated the magnificent choreography is almost graceful all in all the fight scenes are beautiful and fascinating to watchthe use of russian is cool gives the whole thing a rough edge i love the subtitles they have put in so much work to get that just right the accentuated words make you hear what words are stressed even if you dont speak russianthe music is excellent strong meticulous with a rough edge perfect for this moviethe story is compelling from the first second youre drawn in im very curious for the sequel chapter 2

read a review calling it kinetic thats pretty much it good guy seeks revenge on bad guy and his minions plot is thin so its all about style and this does a pretty darn good job considering just how hollow and clichd the story isactually good soundtrack good taste in music and a score fairly diverse but always coherent with the scenes the dialog gets a bit too stereotypical on occasion but theres some good fun there and theres enough in the film to make it a relevant watch without completely despairing as youd think from such an utterly actionoriented productionthe cinematography is actually quite good and visually this movie deserves to be seen in high definitionits really pretty good for how little there is to work with 6510

this movie is a absolute banger from the top notch acting all the way to the simplistic but greatly executed story  this movie is amazing and thrilling in every sense of the word and not just as a thriller but as a film it may be just a revenge angle but you totally get the main characters motives and get behind him quickly everybody who wants a great thriller that is entertaining and stylistic from beginning to end this is your movie its worth it for the fight scenes alone to say more about the look and sound of this movie it looks suspenseful and fascinating kinda like a comic movie this film also has a great score and some perfectly fitting songs in it like killing strangers from marilyn manson which fits the story very much so like i said this is worth your time i think enjoy

i do not get tired of watching this moviethe main character has a skill set that is powerful and compelling the action gunfu segments are flawless and clearly resulted from very professional choreography if you are into firearms you will want to watch this over and over the sequence that featured the keltech ksg shotgun made me go out and get oneit is a compact powerful and lethal weapon for home defense the underworld depicted the continental the red circle were very believable although you know that they could not exist and i enjoyed seeing what dinner reservations turned into and how they used gold coins as their own private currencyvery creative

my favorite movie of the yearthe truth is that is just a messy third act away from being a completely perfect film but i dont think any less of this material nor the intent and thats all thanks to a group of filmmakers with the simple gusto to actually make a revenge movie but that just becomes our waypoint into a world full of weirdo hitman hotels tactical double tapladen action and a populace filled with nothing but goofy reverence for keanus pulp menace wheres hes really at his bestso yeah this one is absolutely awesome

wow watching this is so satisfying a straight to the point film from beginning to end no moment is wasted and i loved every single second of this film stylistically the film is carried out beautifully the action sequences are intense the idea of this underground world based in the continental use specific gold coin currency and their special waste disposal service is as intriguing as the character himself what surprised me the most was also how funny the dialogues are when you least expects it from viggo and this is easily my favorite action movie of all time i wish the sequel is about backstory on how he left viggo

pretty sure this is how everyone would imagine we would react if someone messed with our oh and our wives as well okay with that being said this was an excellent movie the best action i have seen keanu do since the matrix moviesthe story is good enough to hold your interest as welli rated it excellent because i had low expectations for this movie and they were blown away however if i saw this movie in the theater i am not sure my ratingreview would be the same it is one of those types of moviesenjoy then prepare for the sequel

if you start a drinking game where everyone takes a shot whenever someone in gets shot in the face theres a good chance at least one of you will be admitted to the er with acute alcohol intoxication i see this film as an opportunity missed keanu looks amazing at 50 and definitely carries the sad action antihero role well the technical aspects of this film are excellent the action sequences flow beautifully in their cartoonish brutality but the film falls short in the execution of the script a story this silly should not take itself so seriously if only they had more fun with the ludicrous plot and dialogue i mean youve got the mayhem guy from the allstate insurance commercials playing a badguy executive secretary surely thats good for a joke somewhere an 80s action movie in 2014 needs a little more effort to make me laugh with it rather than at it id only recommend it if you are willing to turn your brain off for a couple of hours and enjoy the ride

now this is an action film  from the beginning  well not actually first 10 minutes or so but to the end is full of action interesting plots and scenes and really keeps you entertainedi must say that i have not seen in a long time a better action movie keanu is perfect in the role all other actors are too the story is great the moving of the filmplot is done perfectly all those secret society mafia agents living by the rule are great there is really nothing that you can say is bad about the moviethe language they usei thought it was romanian almost entire film but when they mentioned the russian church i figured out it must be russianloved the ending of the film most of the films have some kind of a bad ending and that can ruin all but this one is perfectmy favorite partscene when those cleaners come to his house after the first shooting and wrap those dead bodies like mummies  man that was somethingnine from me dont know exactly why it is not ten but 950 would be more exact

is there some sort of rule in hollywood the once you hit 50 you join the hitman club because if there is i have no complaints if they keep dishing out movies like theseas you knowkeanu reeves loses his wife and she gives him a so he doesnt cope mourning alone gangsters rob him and kill his and all hell breaks loose the body count and blood in this movie is ridiculousmax payne is what should of beenbut keanu reeves and co have simply made it better the action and the booming soundtrack is fantastic say what you want about keanu reeves being wooden but ive always enjoyed his moviesthis is more of a resurgence for him as it was for liam neeson in takenoverall score 810

to start off the bad points of the movie half of the actors including the main villain felt average or even below average acting skill in some places the effects were easily noticeable sometimes terrible and last but not least the move felt cheesy it felt like they try to paint this super powerful image of the main character just like internet does with chuck norrisnow with the good points as i mentioned half of the cast was pretty bad but keanu reeves was really good i also liked willem dafoe ian mcshane john leguizamo daniel bernhardt and clarke peters some of them had so little screen time but when they did it felt so refreshing to see an interesting character after the sea of average and obviously the most important thing is the stunts a lot of the time they were impressive and kept me on my toesall in all is a pretty good action movie i wouldnt give 7 if it wasnt for keanu i feel like hes a good actor and he deserves a good movie once again after the matrix trilogy but this wasnt it ill keep my fingers crossed for you keanu

keanu reeves is an outstanding actor in this movie and i have always loved his acting he really is a talented person and i must say this movie is a must watch to everyone out there with an interesting story title how he misses his wife after she dies and how he receives a pet puppy as a present from his dead wife is a really interesting storyline and when the gang of thugs of a known businessmans son comes and takes everything from him it is the time to unleash the beast in him and for them to pay the price for the damage they did the directory and the person who did write the script did a great job hard to find such meaningful movies these days when all these fantasy movies comes outgreat movie no more words to describe it

okay so i finally took the chance in watching even after all of the negative reviews that are everywhere good thing is those negative reviews are bs only thing i can agree with in the negative reviews is that keanu reeves is not the best actor for this genre but he did do a fair job keanu done well in the matrix but as for action films he just doesnt fit that part especially a film like where he is the top assassinso after watching the film i see it is exactly what anyone would expect to see the story was good and the acting was fair the film style and the graphics were great this is a fairly put together film sheds light for many with the what would you do in such a situation check the film out and stop listening to those bs reviews out there most of those bad and good reviews are bought reviews

first i hesitated to buy the dvd cause of the so many bloody bullets fallen in this thriller so you are warned then when i read the reviews here i thought to give it a chance also my friends who watched it recommended to check it out in fact i dont regret its a clear revenge story  la rambo i was never bored the pace is fast and the film has been cut to a perfect running time of 97 minutes keanu reeves looked cool and credibly in the real fight scenes with he succeeded no doubt in an unexpected comeback i hope to see him soon in a sequel710

i am glad to see that reeves has returned back to action films as i think he is one of the best together with tom crouz in this kind of kickass filmsi found the acting of reeves as playing mr was again great reeves has class even with few some extra kg and i like itbut the plot was the absolute zero it was like that knock knock  who is there  the bogeyman  the bogeyman who  the bogeyman wanna beat to death your dogkiller soni think the public would appreciate something more than this simplistic plot i cant compare that film with matrix or constantine but in any case there are some very good action scenes here so it worths watching it one time and thats it

is a 2014 american action thriller film directed by chad stahelski and david leitch starring keanu reeves michael nyqvist alfie allen adrianne palicki bridget moynahan dean winters ian mcshane john leguizamo and willem dafoe the film stars reeves as john legendary assassin keanu reeves retired from his violent career after marrying the love of his life her sudden death leaves john in deep mourning when sadistic mobster iosef tarasov alfie allen and his thugs steal johns prized car and kill the puppy that was a last gift from his wife john unleashes the remorseless killing machine within and seeks vengeance meanwhile iosefs father michael nyqvist  johns former colleague  puts a huge bounty on johns head

after all these years though hes still quintessentially keanu he radiates a zenlike calm which makes him simultaneously elusive and irresistible especially in the face of great mayhem theres still a boyish quality to his face but it belies the wisdom of his years hes smarter than he looks but hes in no great hurry to go out of his way to prove it to youat least not on screena character like is right because it allows him to be coolly almost mythically confident yet deliver an amusing deadpan oneliner with detached precision but when the time comesand it comes often in john he can deliver with a graceful yet powerful physicality

is a 21st century gift to viewers who were tired of seeing action movies with poor story shallow plot  cgi is a grand piece of action which has bullets  like lot of bullets great dialog cool 80s reference  few funny moments which are missing in todays action movies keanu reeves look was amazing  the fight choreography reminds me of movies like collateral  the even the influence of martial art movies are quite visible the villein is quite strong great dialog good sets  different languages for all the movie action gun battle lovers is a great piece of action which would surly take your adrenaline level to the topps if a prequel is made it would be great to see how  why is so bad ass 5 star for this amazing movie

as mentioned by many and as may have been guessed by reading the short description the conflict in the movie is very one dimensionalyou do however get a subtle glimpse into a complex world left behind and surprisingly convincing action scenes well the whole movie was really just one action sceneyou can count the bullets fired and he runs out of bullets as you would expect he doesnt have superhuman abilities he does well but not magically his minor character development presents a person who you would believe could be real and who would respond the way he does in the film  though you dont really get to fully understand that until laterbest part for me is that consequences of actions are shown i cant really explain that more without adding spoilers so i wont but by the end of the film it should make sensealso you can see a camera man or stage hand in one of the many many many many fight scenes  which is always a bonus

from my perspective theres only one reason to watch a picture like this and thats to simply escape reality altogether and get your vicarious thrills through the impossible escapades of the films titled hero thats not meant to be a put down i enjoy these flicks myself when im in the right frame of mind but i dont pretend theyre anything more than over the top shoot em up action as they go for the proverbial gusto i must have lost track of keanu reeves career there for a while because i never would have considered him to be the kind of action hero the picture calls for here at the age of fifty the role calls for a fair amount of athleticism and reeves pulls out all the stops sometimes if im alert enough ill start taking a body count when the carnage begins but with this one i got distracted by the waste disposal crew accepting their dinner reservations setting the torch to viggos michael nyqvist private stash was the icing on the cake for this viewer drawing me to the conclusion that the russian mobster would have been a whole lot better off offering the four million dollars to to just go away

some people get this movie others dontxkcd explains it bestjust once i want a real action movie 30 seconds of exposition followed by a perfect 90minute action scene with a huge budget a good choreographer and a great director and they should center it around some character we already know someone we will never get tired of watchingcoming this summer keanu reeves beats up everyonehttpsxkcdcom311still waiting for the river tam version

i have to make a confession before getting into this movie  i normally cant stand keanu reeves apart from playing a likable goofball in the bill  ted films and an okay performance in the matrix i dont think hes a particularly good actor which is the main reason why i avoided this movie when it played in theaters i decided to give it a look after hearing several positive reviews of it and after finding a copy i could check out for free from my local libraryafter watching it i am glad that i took a chance for starters reeves gives an adequate performance it certainly helps that he doesnt have a huge amount of dialogue but what he is given he does deliver acceptably however he does a bravo job when it comes to the physical part of the role  he throws himself into the action coming across both as a spectacular skilled foe while at the same time not coming across as outlandishly fancy  i could believe a man could be skilled enough to do everything he did it also helps that he gets wounded and hurt along the way which prevents him from becoming unbelievably and annoyingly perfect while im on the subject of action kudos has to also go to director chad stahelsk for staging it successfully again and again the gun fights and martial arts are spectacular praise has to also go to him for keeping the movie moving speedily along without any boring bits despite there not being a terrible amount of plot and for the fact that the little plot there is will be familiar to many viewersi see they are making a sequel to this movie if both reeves and stahelsk return ill definitely be seeing it

is a dark and explosive action hit now before you commit to watching this movie you must be in the mood for overthetop unrealistic action violence  if that is what you are looking for then provides in every area the movie revolves around a retired hitman who recently dropped out of the game to stay at home with his wife after a series of unsettling events john is thrown back into the world of underground mobsters and assassins as he seeks revenge against the men who took all he had left the story is not great but provides enough sway to convince you to cheer for throughout the movie as he kills dozens of russian mobsters keanu reeves performance is subpar as his character rarely speaks and shows little to no emotion but since he is a world class assassin this may fit his character perfectly the fight scenes are entertaining and the handhand combat competes with that of the bourne series but the story is not as compelling and also not as confusingoverall is a satisfying action movie but dont watch it for anything but a good time

liam neeson must have been busy so the director got keanu reeves to take his place problem is reeves isnt known for playing this type of character and took away something from the filmhowever since the film has got a cool plot to it its still pretty good even with reeves as the lead reeves plays the deadliest hitman ever that just so happens to be retired because he fell in love well his wife died and left him a puppy he encounters some punk russian kid that wants his ride later the kid shows up takes the ride kills the and beats up john well he messed with the wrong guy it just so happens the kids mob dad was the guy john used to work for and now he wants revengewhats cool in the movie is the whole hitman code speech the continental hotel where one doesnt do business paying with these gold coins and making a dinner reservation the ending is where the film falls apart and just becomes another action flick with the hero out to get the final bad guy it was rather silly but the first 80 minutes was really goodfinal verdict check it out good story for action fans

heh so thats what it looks like when matrix and equilibrium have unprotected relationship sadly if the two movies above were filled not only with extremely brilliant scenes for the technology of the time but also quite deep and meaningful plot  seems to be a pretty onesided coinhe lost his dearly beloved he got mugged thats all the premise you need though i do admit that viggos exposition was impressive some background would be nicegranted all the plot unravellings i dont understand why would he hang up viggos call both john and viggo know better and instead of going on some mad rampage a simpler fate couldve been arranged much simpler or it could end the same but it would at least look plausiblered circle encounter is laughable beautiful obviously until he stares at his desired victim and just lets him run away i first thought he wants the usual suffering torture etc but apparently he never needed it so why not end the movie halfway through if there was a chanceall the side characters are merely plot devices female assassin has to explain what the management was marcus deus ex machinayosefs death could probably only rival talia alghouls home siege red circle car scene all these great performances yet the very antagonist of this movie was supposed to be hidden in impenetrable fortress but snipe here snipe there done seriouslythe list can continue but the point is that very often the suspension of disbelief is raised even if you really want to keep itand of course i cant help but stand in line with every russian who was severely offended by this movie now i know that between italian and russian mafia  these nations shouldnt really be surprised when their people are slaughtered and i would never imagine that hollywood would ever get russian actors but that song the lullaby i know russians are a sick nation firsthand but not even the craziest of us would sing a lullaby in a nightclub in a bath with half naked womeni feel that giving the movie 710 is a very generous gift if not for and viggos performance  510 wouldve been the right place aka  a movie that really isnt remotely good but is at least worth looking for the some thrills but hey i can play as now he is played by ol good neo and there was plenty of gun fu who can resist that

this film surprised mebecause i didnt expect it to be so much funwhen i first saw the trailer for this filmi figured it was just going to be this really over the top action movie that will certainly be loved by animal rights activistwhat i didnt expect was for the main character that being to have so many layersnowadays many action films tend to lean toward the protagonist being this icy and remorseless human being who wouldnt show any expressions even if he stepped on a nailbut didnt do thathe had a difficult past he cried when he was sad he loved his car and he showed a great deal of affection to his dogthe story had a few plot holes and was a bit choppy and silly from time to timebut at least the movie had substancethis is one of those films where there is no need to be concerned about character development a well written story or oscarcaliber performancesthis is a good old fashioned popcorn movie to which the audience can simply kick back relax and have a good timeand thats all there is too it

keanu reeves stars as the badass hitman who happens to kill dozens of people in order to avenge the death of his that was gifted by his recently deceased wife the action is slick and in some ways is reminiscent of taken in the manner of the deaths throughout the movie the motive behind the action of is not clear he basically does all the killings in order to take revenge for his and his stolen car it does not make much sense which is why it is hard to understand what the screenwriters were thinking while writing the performances of keanu reeves is understated and a tad bit disappointing the short runtime makes it easy to watch but the absurd plot will not please the people who are looking for a smart ingenious thriller please leave your brains at home before watching this movie

i mean cmon cmon movie you are a fun movie stop being so grim about things you had great action great cinematography appropriate  casting of keeanu reeves as that plain faced gunchrist being all stupid and honorable goofy russians more goofy russians terminal amounts of goofy russians that scene with the policeman its fun even some keanu moping was appropriatebut why did you have to kill a puppy movie killing puppies is not fun movie its antifun if you have a character kill a puppy a shot in the head wont be enough closure and so it wasnt and the movie was made significantly less fun by it on the bright side i kinda now like ramsay a bit more

is not just another action packed train its a roller coaster and in which i happily enjoyed my ride you have a easy opening sequence like going up in a roller coaster but just minutes into it the ride starts with endless ups and downs for you to cheer then there is acting of the cast each one did their role perfectly and effectively and the cast is great from neo to goblin to theon greyjoy we have a variety of good actors and then again after one last upside down the movie flats outs like at the end of roller coaster ride this movie will again remind you a big budget is not important for big thrills this is a roller coaster ride you should try one time

so why watch i asked myself that same question when the wife and i got a free redbox code and she had heard good things about this movie and wanted to watch it while i on the other hand not being a big fan of keanu reeves originally wanted no part in it but decided that as long as we were watching for free then i couldnt complain too much and there was absolutely nothing to complain about i loved this moviethe draw to this movie is of course the nonstop heartpounding action the plot wasnt complicated and there was a lot of this universe left unexplained but i felt that actually added to the movie they didnt have to get into ever painstaking detail of who was because the bad guys knew who he was and they were terrified of him that was really all you needed to knowlike my summary says this was just a surprisingly fun movie just sit back dont let your brain think too hard about the journey and just enjoy the ride

i suppose for me the idea of was something like falling down but without the social comments and instead of an ordinary guy pushed over the edge here the protagonist is a retired hitman needless to say the entire plot is adequately summed up in the trailer and if you like movies that set out to entertain in a simple way the comic book logic and emphasis on stunts and action here will be right up your alley from my viewpoint i hesitate to say reeves carries this movie to a certain extent but i dont want to take too much away from the rest of the cast though some like palicki arent given much of a chance to demonstrate their full range of talents or have a strong impact on the proceedings for lack of time on screen nyqvist gives an interesting performance but is fighting against a particularly weak script even by action movie standards and his russian mob boss character often comes off as somewhat of an imbecile even if there are deliberate attempts at humor peppered inoverall reeves is appealing and inherently sympathetic with a sombre lowkey performance sort of reminiscent of what he did in the watcher notably his physical work with regards to the action is commendable but in my opinion it is a shame it was not applied to a movie with a slightly stronger script and direction when compared with a movie that strives for similar goals like the equalizer which lacked those deficiencies and made for a more well rounded and engaging viewing experience worth watching could of been better so  out of

under normal circumstances i wouldnt have seen im not a big fan of action thrillers and keanu reeves hasnt been my favourite actor either the selection of movies was pretty limited at the theatres so decided to give a chancehave to confess that i was pleasantly surprised by the film and enjoyed it much more than expected in particular keanu reeves as was very good in the past the only roles that he ever looked comfortable and appropriate in were the characters who looked somewhat bewildered about what was going on the first matrix film in particular played to his strengths whereas the follow ups didnt convince as he was supposed to be a stronger character there is no doubt that he pulls this off in so will not be quite as snooty about keanu in the future the film itself is quite stylish and somewhat similar to sin city in terms of style personally i found the on screen comments quite annoying but the film is reasonably written in terms of screenplay if you are a fan of action thrillers andor keanu reeves im quite sure youll really enjoy this movie

a retired hitman gives up his criminal lifestyle due to personal tragedy  when the russian mob steal his car and kill his puppy he decides to go in a revenge mission and thats that as far as inciting incident and plot line goes in this modern film noiraction thriller  despite having a painfully over familiar story that youve seen countless times is far more thoroughly enjoyable than it has any right to be  the fact that it stars keanu reeves as keanu reeves action hero should put you or any other rational intelligent off the film but hes actually quite good in this  okay hes basically choreographing all the same moves as he learned in the matrix but thankfully reeves doesnt have to do much involving the skill of acting  why break the habit of a life time   but as a no holds barred enjoyably mean thriller with its tongue firmly in cheek  sorry to disturb you mister but weve had a complaint about the noise its very entertaining  if you want to find out how this movie could have been check out the horrible mess that is smokin aces which has a not too dissimilar plot

i do not understand why this movie has that many good reviews sure it has some good things going for it choreography some characters nice action scenes interesting places but thats it the whole plot especially the first 20 minutes happens too fast for the audience to even feel some sympathy for dialogs are clumsy some situations are ridiculous and i do not mean the fight scenes those i can cope with the flow is justweird oh and lots of clichs really predictable characters with no real personality everyone is kinda hollow and simple i dont know maybe it was not supposed to be taken seriously but it sure does not feel like a light hearted action film

ok i know it is a movie a complete work of fiction i know actors didnt really die but this kind of movie glorifies pointblank execution killing justified because the guys being killed work for a russian mafia in new york but it still cheapens life and we simply have too much of that in our moviesin general i like keanu reeves and i like his character here who formerly worked as a hit man for the same russian gang that he has to turn against he had successfully gotten out retired and had a life with his loving wife but she had a terminal illness and she died still in grief he gets a delivery at home it is a cute puppy that his wife had arranged to be delivered right after her death so he would have a companion and he could remember herstopped for gasoline in his beautiful 1969 mustang puppy in the front seat a guy walks up and asks how much shocked simply says it is not for sale the man says something rude in russian then is shocked when answers him in russian that night the alerts and gets up to find three men in his house they must have looked up his address from the mustangs license plate they beat him mercilessly killed his and stole his mustang sounds like an old western movie doesnt it well this guy is the frivolous son of the russian gang leader and when the dad michael nyqvist as viggo tarasov finds out his son stole john car and killed his he knew would hunt all of them down which is what he does and that is mostly what the movie is aboutthe other good role is willem dafoe as fellow hitman marcus who appears to accept a 4 million job to kill but instead he ends up helping himthis is just a plain shoot and kill revenge movie and it could have been so much better but i suppose this is what appeals to movie goers nowadays

i really struggled to choose a rating for this movie lots of good lots of badgoodkeanu does a great job just the right mix of believable and unbelievablereally excellent directing and cinematography its really easy in these kinds of films for the action scenes to be hard to follow but these are great no surprise this crew were associated with the matrix whose action scenes were similarly cleana few nice little surprises but not enough of thembad spoilers hereoh lord the clichs first the entire premise badass hitman forced out of retirement to avenge a wrong done to him russian mob boss with brash dumbass son obligatory stash of weapons and money sealed under concrete floor old friend who appears to have turned on our hero but saves his bacon at a couple of crucial moments climactic fight with the main bad guy in which they toss aside their guns and fight hand to handthat wrong done to him killing his and stealing his car seriously i get the sentiment behind the and his dead wife and all but still i was reminded of the bit in last action hero about how they killed his favorite second cousin or whateverif this was the first movie youd ever seen in this genre it would be totally amazing as it is i kept seeing a lot of things id seen before and not enough things that i hadnt those things were really well done but that doesnt make up for them being horribly unoriginalif you can quiet your brain enough to just watch and enjoy this is worth seeing just dont expect to see much that is new

is an awesome video game and one of the best thirdperson shooters ive ever played with incredible groundbreaking graphics a handsome lead character to control in and a more clever story premise than you might realize whats that is a movie is a movie is a movie that explains why i was so good no wonder has a video game plot video game action a video game reality a video game mentality video game art lighting and text and a bunch of random dudes popping out out of nowhere getting shot one by one like theyre in some video game or something keanu reeves kicks serious ass as and i laugh at the thought of people who dont think hes a good actor reeves is keanu reeves is really cool is really uncool i love puppies as much as the next guy but not as much as apparently john 75 man kill count speaks volumes has a genius story premise with well choreographed and very well shot stylish action that is fun but not that suspenseful almost has too much pointless violence but they did mess with his puppy and it is such a pure action film

of its genre a quite entertaining if ultimately absurd way to spend a couple of hours of your life other posters have gone into the plot discrepancies before and considering there isnt really what you could call a plot then these are major flaws the only slightly interesting plot element is the continental hotel a hotel for hit men and hitwomen where psychopathic killers can be assured a good nights sleep without fear of being attacked by other psychopathic killers perhaps there is a hole in the market for that sort of thingbut if you are able to overlook the films flaws you will find much to like here it is slickly and stylishly shot the action sequences of which there are many are well paced and choreographed in a style which borrows heavily from mma its has a strong supporting cast and even keanu reeves looks convincingthere is a time and a place for this sort of film and it does what it sets out to do with a degree of flair and i for one wouldnt mind seeing more of john

totally insane movie with awesome fights keanu delivers a terrific performance the story line is very weak but the characterization of the hero is stunning the other characters have limited screen space full credits to the stunt master is a killer ghost man he can kill three men armed only with a pencil but somehow manages to overlook a couple of brainless thugs hack into his house lets them beat the crap out of himself kill his and steal his car is so famous that even the policeman the bartenders the mafia all the town know him but the son of a mafia boss for some reason does not even hear about him the funniest thing in the movie is the hero kills hundreds of gangsters the mafia boss and his son just for a stupid this movie should have been titled a man rises for a dog

just another action movie with an ok script good cast ok acting nothing but a lot of action really liked the character by keanu reeves and his past liked the parts where he speaks russian but a lot of scenes are just so much clichjumping out of the car in the last second dodge a bullet in the last second things that you see in all of other ok movies out there i thing that they had all the potential to make a great movie but turns out to be just ok dafoe could had been used in a way better way than what he waswell i think it will be just another action movie that nobody will remember in an near future

the first 30 minutes is very the equalizer i was thinking give up on it the policeman scene after the home fight changed my mind and scenes like this one actually is the entertaining part of the movieim not the fan of the story so when the police showed up i thought john is about to be hunted by both gang and police which is a sign of you can spend your night better than thisno the conversation between john and policeman jimmy change the tune of the whole storylegendary hitman is a famous hitman a fair hitman a man whose reputation is so good even police dont want to bother him everyone in the business knows him and almost everyone respected him with this idea in mind the story makes a little sense now the ridiculous decision that let the gang boss go and killed his son is because his fairness johns business is always with the dogkilling son until gang boss killed his friendthe idea of continental hotel is interesting too when hitman does business they stay in the hotel so they can reset without worry the one breaks hotel rule will be executed by the hotel this alone can make another moviein the end ive to say movie like this one and the equalizer makes me aware that my time is passing kids nowadays like movie like such a lot of action less story

this is a nice movie if you are looking for some action without any further sensekeanu is the completely overpowered superman hero killing every guy on his way to revenge he could have killed easily some times because one of the bad guys obviously was a better fighter and has beaten him up twice but of course keanu wins at the end it is like one of the old superhero movies or macgyver the bad guys always kill the innocent just for fun right when they get in front of the gun but the main enemy cant be killed when unconscious no those enemies has to be brought into some prison and even then the bad guys dont kill them immediately no they chat and have a good time and before he gets killed the boss leaves of course maybe he is too soft to see his enemy dying just as an example of this noncredibility but still nice braindead actionthe storyline is pretty much linear no big surprises some strange decisions and some illogic moments

i didnt buy it i really like keanu and some of his movies are really cool and interesting but this one is like an almost complete nonsense for me just killings and killings of bad guys because is sad and there is nothing left for him in this world maybe in the killers world they are like that i dont know i liked taken with liam neeson better it had a more credible story in most of the other actors didnt perform wellthe son of the big boss is playing as unsustainable as he did in game of thrones i guess keanu had to drag all this movie by himself and he wasnt that convincing all the time although there are some scenes where i liked his acting and the fight scenes were pretty realistic without too much fancy moves and visual effects i dont want to criticize the work and effort put into this movies is just that this movie its not for me 100

john quick and slick close range shooting hasnt been developed or observed in this movie making eraso these gun fights were unique and mind blowingkeanu reeves couldnt be any more of a perfect actor to play this character because of his slim body and ninjitsu skills which he carried out from matrixhis black shiny suit attire and black mustang suited him and his devotion on getting his gift avenged i liked his dedication and his focusreally cool movie

going into this film i had high hopes regarding reviews all around is keanu reeves back no does keanu reeves excel in the role of yes but not many people couldnt this film lacked in every way possible regarding substance when i say substance i am referring to the plot acting and overall feelyes keanu reeves acting was on point yet everyone else in the movie seemed like straight to dvd actors trash especially the villain michael nyqvist such a corny performance if by my taste i was reviewing this movie i would rate it at a 4 thats a weak 4 but i am going to put myself in a neutral position since action movies arent my forte to conclude if you are in love with action films please see this movie you will love it but if youre more of a bourne trilogy kind of action film fan then dont story could have been understood by a toddler yet this is rated r what kind of adults just watch movies for explosions and gunfire let us relate to a character

not bad for movie cheap night my wife and i went to on cheap tuesday was a good stress release for a bad week what worked reeves is a physical actor how he moves walks etc and plays the action sequences well jason statham would have been a better the revenge plot where mobsters kill johns and steals his car resonates with the viewer what did not work the action is too fast in a video game style there was a need for more humor which the movie mel gibsons payback implemented well if you are in the market for a revenge flick i recommend payback over is okay a vod movie six out of ten
